attributes.action: Retain the Anthony Gormley outdoor figures in their current locations after the Hayward Gallery exhibition finishes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Retain the Anthony Gormley outdoor figures in their current locations after the Hayward Gallery exhibition finishes."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13678.asp

Prime Minister's Office
